item.description:
Take Charge of your love life !!
Just like George Washington took Charge of the Continental Army on the Grounds of the Sheraton Commander in Cambridge.

Single Mingle at the Sheraton Commander in Harvard Square.
And don't fret about the parking - we have negotiated $5 Valet Parking !!!

$15

Singles Dance with DJ, a great sound and light system, food, martinis, wine & optional ice breaking activities.

Cocktails from 7:00-9:00
Optional Speed Dating from 730-830. First come first served
As well as Ice breakers for non-speed daters

Dancing with America's Best DJ Johnny Z !!

As Always Dress to Impress - No Jeans, T-shirts or Sneakers Please. This is a classy joint - let's rise to the occaision and look good.

I'm working on a discounted Room Rate just in case you're driving from afar or want to play it safe. - stay tuned for the rate

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Take Command of Your Love Life at the Sheraton Commander
